p: This study was performed in the south of Alborz Mountain protected area, located in Alborz province of Iran (35° 44′ N to 36° 35′ N and 51° 00′ E to 51° 36′ E). Alborz protected area is one of the main habitats of H. perforatum in Iran. H. perforatum grows at an altitude range from 1000 to 4000 m in different ecological conditions.
